name: SF YouthWorks
description: Paid work experience and internships for San Francisco youth ages 16-24
fullDescription: YouthWorks provides San Francisco young people ages 16-24 with paid work experience, job training, and career exploration opportunities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Paid work experience and internships
- Summer employment programs
- Year-round employment opportunities
- Job readiness training
- Career exploration and mentorship
- Supportive services
howToGetIt:
1. Must be 16-24 years old
2. Must be San Francisco resident
3. Apply through DCYF or partner organizations
4. Complete orientation and job readiness training
5. Get matched with employment opportunity
keywords: YouthWorks, San Francisco, youth employment, summer jobs, internship, young people, teen jobs, work experience, 16-24
